ygData.subject: Re: Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Funny you should mention that..... The (only) Bard-oriented Quest in Kelethin is designed for somewhat low-level bards (1-4th).  Not to worried about
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:31 PM 7/20/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Talien <Talien@...>
>
>Hello,
>
>Anyone have any ideas of places to go for some good quests? Ive gone to
>Valen, and also delivered some mail. Do you guys know of any quests that
>give instruments? (Ones you can keep), or songs?

Funny you should mention that.....
The (only) Bard-oriented Quest in Kelethin is designed for somewhat
low-level bards (1-4th). Not to worried about spoiling this one - it's
been all over the place. Just talk to Sylia, the Guildmaster in the
Songweaver's Guild, she'll tell you what to do.

Conveniently, that's also a good place to start on a mail run, being the
central collection-point for Faydwer.

I've heard that there's another, much higher level Quest that gives, as a
reward, a song - but that the song might be anything.

Still hoping for more magical instruments....
Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
